Condition_summary_1: Sediment and erosion control measures must be in place and maintained to avoid sediment release during work.
Condition_summary_2: Fish rescue and relocation required before work in isolated areas.
Condition_summary_3: Monitoring and reporting including photographic records and as-built surveys.
Condition_summary_4: Habitat offsetting measures with specific criteria (e.g., overwintering pools, vegetation coverage).
Offset_footprint_size: 50 m2 (boulder clusters), 100 m2 (sweeper trees), 80% vegetation coverage
Instream_structures: overwintering pool habitat (1.7m depth), boulder clusters, sweeper trees
